name: Cameratraps2
tagline: images and scans of 2011 vibi plots for use in placing camera traps
body:
### Camera trap sites
We will put images and the .pdf file associated with each PCAP site here for access from the field to help find plots and set up camera traps so they don't interfere with the PCAP sites. We may use fulcrum for to access these documents.

## .pdf files of final data sheets
These are the data sheets scanned after the data were entered.

## Images for each plot
These are Pat's best guess at the best photo to re-find the plot.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
